title: FS: Rose PC Mordecai Brown (Buster Brown error)

posts.post_title: FS: Rose PC Mordecai Brown (Buster Brown error)
posts.post_content:
Very rare card which has sold just four times since 2009. Just four total graded in PSA and SGC. 

$7500 delivered, Paypal FF.  Email or PM if interested. 

[url=https://flic.kr/p/25VFU2h][img]https://live.staticflickr.com/975/41301678274_c05c34320b_c.jpg[/img][/url]

Sharp Looking Card

Good Luck with the sale
